_description: ‘De Falsitate’ — two cross-rhymes quatrains with the same two rhymes

OxfMert248.First Lines:
falseness and couetys er ferisWil neþer oþer be
                    sweke…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…es þer no man þat þem sterys bot heuer es
                    vnlwes illyke
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 54.
